channel.title: Drinktober 2019 on Drinktober 2020
channel.description: Recent content in Drinktober 2019 on Drinktober 2020

item.title: Mutiny!
item.description: Gather round and listen to this tale of treachery upon the high seas. It seems my shipmates took offence to my language yesterday, in the middle of the night those mutinous dogs dragged me from my bunk and tossed me overboard. I managed to save myself from Davey Jones' locker by lashing a raft together from some driftwood, but now I’m a castaway, adrift upon the Big Sea.

item.title: With a what now?
item.description: Fuck! You! You’re a fucking wanker! We’re gonna punch you right in the balls! Fuck! You! With a fucking anchor! You’re all cunts so fuck you all! Alestorm - Fucked with an anchor Stretching the theme a little bit for the 5th of Drinktober, but I couldn’t resist the opportunity to combine three of my favourite things. Pirate costumes, heavy metal and gratuitous swearing! Sing along, ye scurvy dogs!

item.title: Well that was a challenge
item.description: Iâ€™ve survived a challenge! Most of you people know Iâ€™m a little….. funny. Iâ€™m quite OCD and if things arenâ€™t right or tidy, expect a breakdown. Iâ€™m also an emotional drinker: annoyed? Have a brandy. Happy? Have a champers. Stressed? Vat of wine and an absolut chaser. So yesterday I didnâ€™t manage a post, but I did have half my kitchen ceiling down fixing a leaking lead pipe, plaster all over, half my bathroom taken out and no electric due to my dodge lighting.

item.title: It's time to get Loco!
item.description: For the 4th of Drinktober we step into the ring with the mighty El Loco - the most feared luchador in all of East Yorkshire! Undefeated in every match, this fearsome hero of the ring strikes terror into the hearts of his opponents, and loves nothing more than to celebrate a successful match with a victory beer!

item.title: Water leaks from the ceiling and you also have to drink it
item.description: Ok day three, whatcha got? Well we all know Iâ€™m a prolific stress drinker. So today I had a small paddy that my house is essentially falling down, nothing works and my pipes (Which are leaking) are made of lead (apparently this is bad). So I realllllly fancied some wine, or 9 double vodkas of something . However, Iâ€™ve stayed strong and drank water all goddamn day. Which is slightly less appealing to drink when itâ€™s slowly dripping from your ceiling.

item.title: What a lovely day!
item.description: Beer. Beer never changes. When the old world fell, only a few survived. Roaming the blacktop between the remnants of the cities, scavenging for the last remaining booze of a lost civilisation. A drop of ale in the wasteland can help keep a man sane - because if you don’t keep your head… you’re nothing but Roadkill… Things are going a little bit post-apocalyptic for the 3rd of Drinktober as I take to the roads of the blasted wasteland that was once Yorkshire in search of more beer.

item.title: Looking a little pale
item.description: A fairly quiet one for the second of Drinktober. I’m hard at work in the Beercave prepping for the insanity to come, just taking a break to enjoy a tasty Rudgate Pale. Tune in tomorrow, same beer time, same beer channel, when we start to kick things up a notch!

item.title: DAY 2!
item.description: Day 2, feeling confident! Day one was a piece of piss because I was ill, so I slept through my normal drinking time! So far today Iâ€™m on 5 coffees, a herbal tea and 4 waters, might be piddling for England but sober af! ğŸ™ŒğŸ»

item.title: All washed up
item.description: I’ve been attacked by sea monsters, and hurled into the deep by an ungrateful crew, but at last, my nautical adventure comes to a happy ending, as I’ve washed up on this Tropical island. Now to enjoy a few tasty beers among the palm trees with my little parrot buddy Iago. Cheers!

item.title: Back once again with the Drunken Master
item.description: It’s the first of Drinktober, and I should be working hard on getting everything set up for this year’s shenanigans, but instead here I am just chilling in my hammock with a nice cold lager. I guess I’m just a Lazy Boy ;)

item.title: Drinktober 2020 Trailer
item.description: Here’s the official video trailer for Drinktober 2020. Enjoy!

item.title: Drinktober 2020 - Lockdown lock-in!
And that's a wrap
item.description: So there we have it, folks. Another year of #Drinktober comes to a close, and we absolutely smashed it this time around. Donations are currently sitting at 110% of the fundraising target, Heidi’s swanned off to Tenerife to drink her body weight in Prosecco, and it’s time to sign off until we come back even bigger and better for Drinktober 2020! Watch this space!

item.title: Itâ€™s only chuffing DONE!
item.description: Well, itâ€™s done!! And what a bloody month. Hereâ€™s what I learned: I donâ€™t need alcohol, but I DO have the most stressful life and I donâ€™t take enough time out. The past 2 weeks at work were hard. Not having a drink made me realise my job can be emotionally draining. I have little time for myself and I take on too much without thinking about unwinding in a better way.

item.title: Day 31 - Drinkoween!
item.description: Gee, Jonny, what are we going to do tonight? Same thing we do every night - DÌƒÍ¦Ì’Í¨Ì…ÍŠÍ€Í¢Í…Ì—Í–Í–Í“Ì¹ÍRÌšÍ‚ÌµÍÍ•Ì Ì˜IÌŠÌ‘ÍÍ†Í§ÍÌÌ‰Ì½Ì²Ì°Í‰NÍ­ÌÍ¨Í­Ì”Í‘Ì½Í¢Ì¶ÍÌ¼Ì»Ì©KÍ—Ì†Í„Í«Ì‰ÌŒÍ†Ì´Ì¶Í¢Ì¼Ì°Í“Í“Ì² Ì‰Í­Ì‚Í’ÍÍˆÍˆÍ“Í™BÌƒÌ‘Í­Ì€ÍªÍ¯ÍªÍ¦Ì›ÍÍ¢Ì¬ÌªÍ”Ì»Ì–EÍ‹Í©Í€Ì·Ì•Ì²Ì˜ÌEÍƒÌÍ­Ì“Í„ÌÌ¾Í«ÌµÒ‰Ì›Ì­Í™Ì©ÍRÌÌÌ“Ì‰ÍªÌ®Íˆ ÌšÍ†Ì¿ÍªÍ§ÍŒÌ‰ÍÍˆÌªÌ¬Ì˜ÍÌ£Ì¬Ì©AÍ¨Ì–Ì–NÍ¬Ì„ÌÌÌÍªÌ¸Í‰ÌºÍ•Ì¥Ì«DÍ¦Í¬Í€ÌºÌÌªÌ©Í Í›Í‹Í¥ÌÌ¨Ì¡ÍˆÌ²ÍˆÌ¤ÌHÌ¾Í®Ì‚ÍœÍ Ì»ÌªÌ®ÌªÌÌ¹Í‡Í…AÌ”Ì†Ì½ÌŠÍ„Ì§Ì¸Ì™Ì®Ì¥ÌŸÌ­Í…IÌ‰Ì„Ì‹Ì¿Í®Í¨Ì§Í€Ì¦Í•Í‡Í•LÍÌ‚Ì“Í‘ÍœÍ Ì Ì¹Ì£Ì—Ì°ÌŸÍ‰ Í¯ÍƒÌÌ¨Ì ÍˆÍ‡Ì«ÍˆÌ¼Ì—SÍ¥Í¥Ì„Í©Í¤Ì”ÌŒÌ·Ì¼Í…Ì¯Ì±AÍ‚ÍÍ¬ÍŠÌšÍ©Í‚Í Ò‰Í”ÌœÍ•Í”Ì»ÌÍÍ–TÌ’Ì†Ì•Ì£Ì¥AÌÌ‰Í‹Í¥Í¥Ì„ÍŒÌ‘ÍƒÍÌ­ÌÌ£NÍ©Ì‹ÌÍÍ‘Í¥Ì†Í«Í¢ÍœÌ˜Ì®Ì±Ì–Ì–ÌªÌÍšÌ¯!Í¦ÌÌ‹Ì¾Ò‰Ì´Í“ We’ve reached once again, the final night of #Drinktober -Drinkowe’en is here! Seemed only right to see the end with the most evil beer I could lay my hands on… If you’ve enjoyed my ridiculous antics all month, why not click on the link over there -> (or down below if you’re on mobile) and donate a few bob for the real hero of Drinktober.

item.title: Day 31 - Drinkoween!
item.description: Gee, Jonny, what are we going to do tonight? Same thing we do every night - DÌƒÍ¦Ì’Í¨Ì…ÍŠÍ€Í¢Í…Ì—Í–Í–Í“Ì¹ÍRÌšÍ‚ÌµÍÍ•Ì Ì˜IÌŠÌ‘ÍÍ†Í§ÍÌÌ‰Ì½Ì²Ì°Í‰NÍ­ÌÍ¨Í­Ì”Í‘Ì½Í¢Ì¶ÍÌ¼Ì»Ì©KÍ—Ì†Í„Í«Ì‰ÌŒÍ†Ì´Ì¶Í¢Ì¼Ì°Í“Í“Ì² Ì‰Í­Ì‚Í’ÍÍˆÍˆÍ“Í™BÌƒÌ‘Í­Ì€ÍªÍ¯ÍªÍ¦Ì›ÍÍ¢Ì¬ÌªÍ”Ì»Ì–EÍ‹Í©Í€Ì·Ì•Ì²Ì˜ÌEÍƒÌÍ­Ì“Í„ÌÌ¾Í«ÌµÒ‰Ì›Ì­Í™Ì©ÍRÌÌÌ“Ì‰ÍªÌ®Íˆ ÌšÍ†Ì¿ÍªÍ§ÍŒÌ‰ÍÍˆÌªÌ¬Ì˜ÍÌ£Ì¬Ì©AÍ¨Ì–Ì–NÍ¬Ì„ÌÌÌÍªÌ¸Í‰ÌºÍ•Ì¥Ì«DÍ¦Í¬Í€ÌºÌÌªÌ©Í Í›Í‹Í¥ÌÌ¨Ì¡ÍˆÌ²ÍˆÌ¤ÌHÌ¾Í®Ì‚ÍœÍ Ì»ÌªÌ®ÌªÌÌ¹Í‡Í…AÌ”Ì†Ì½ÌŠÍ„Ì§Ì¸Ì™Ì®Ì¥ÌŸÌ­Í…IÌ‰Ì„Ì‹Ì¿Í®Í¨Ì§Í€Ì¦Í•Í‡Í•LÍÌ‚Ì“Í‘ÍœÍ Ì Ì¹Ì£Ì—Ì°ÌŸÍ‰ Í¯ÍƒÌÌ¨Ì ÍˆÍ‡Ì«ÍˆÌ¼Ì—SÍ¥Í¥Ì„Í©Í¤Ì”ÌŒÌ·Ì¼Í…Ì¯Ì±AÍ‚ÍÍ¬ÍŠÌšÍ©Í‚Í Ò‰Í”ÌœÍ•Í”Ì»ÌÍÍ–TÌ’Ì†Ì•Ì£Ì¥AÌÌ‰Í‹Í¥Í¥Ì„ÍŒÌ‘ÍƒÍÌ­ÌÌ£NÍ©Ì‹ÌÍÍ‘Í¥Ì†Í«Í¢ÍœÌ˜Ì®Ì±Ì–Ì–ÌªÌÍšÌ¯!Í¦ÌÌ‹Ì¾Ò‰Ì´Í“ We’ve reached once again, the final night of #Drinktober -Drinkowe’en is here! Seemed only right to see the end with the most evil beer I could lay my hands on… If you’ve enjoyed my ridiculous antics all month, why not click on the link over there -> (or down below if you’re on mobile) and donate a few bob for the real hero of Drinktober.

item.title: Day 30 - Bustin' makes me feel good
item.description: These supernatural incursions have been getting out of hand. Time to bust out my trusty proton pack for the 30th of #Drinktober and send them all back to Spookytown! Join us again tomorrow night for the final frightfest of #Drinktober 2019 - Drinkowe’en!!

item.title: Day 29 - When there's no more room in hell
item.description: The horror continues on the 29th of #Drinktober as the dead rise from their graves to walk the earth in a never-ending quest for beer. Beware, the terrors of the Graveyard Shift!

item.title: Day 28 - They'll get yours in the end!
item.description: Spooky creatures of the night seem to be everywhere on the 28th of #Drinktober - I just caught this Gangly Ghoul sneaking a snack from the fridge!

item.title: Day 27 - You remind me of the Babe
item.description: Another monstrous creature appears for the 27th of #Drinktober - emerging from his haunted skull cave comes the evil King Goblin!

item.title: Day 26 - Sky is turning red!
item.description: Frightening scenes for the 26th of #Drinktober! The season of terror begins beneath a Blood Red Sky, with the release of the nightmarish Drinkowe’en video trailer

item.title: Sheâ€™s back!!
item.description: Sheâ€™s back!!! Due to a short break, mainly consisting of the website not letting me log on, a bout of horrendous flu which killed me completely for a week and my job being ridiculously full on for several days which consumed my life….. I am back!! Just in time for the end to be in sight! Thank you to everyone who has donated so far, this has certainly been a journey to this point ğŸ˜‚

item.title: Day 25 - Pew! Pew!
item.description: Beer and video games - not a bad way to spend the 25th of #Drinktober! Things take a spooky turn tomorrow as we begin the countdown to Drinkowe’en

item.title: Day 24 - As long as you cleanup after
item.description: It’s the 24th of #Drinktober - just one more week to go! Tonight’s is another Loch Lomond beer - this one’s Come on Pilgrim New England IPA.

item.title: Day 23 - Night of the comet
item.description: Oh deer. Tonight’s #Drinktober offering is a Comet dry-hopped lager.

item.title: Day 22 - High Voltage
item.description: It’s a real shocker for the 22nd of #Drinktober, as we head to the Electric Cafe, probably for some electric sausage & chips.

item.title: Day 21 - Different class
item.description: 21st of #Drinktober, and tonight’s beer is a Loch Lomond Different Class.

item.title: Day 20 - We all float here
item.description: The strangest thing happened for the 20th of #Drinktober. Just a couple of sips of my beer and I found myself free from the shackles of gravity and beginning to Levitate!

item.title: Day 19 - For those about to Bock
item.description: Day 19 of #Drinktober comes to you all the way from Bocktoberfest. Prost!

item.title: Day 18 - Keep taking the Pils
item.description: Yep, Vikki was working at Erofame again last week, so I’ve got a nice drop of Gilde Pilsener for the 18th of #Drinktober, all the way from Hannover.

item.title: Day 17 - Don'cha think?
item.description: #Drinktober the 17th sees me back to normal. Tonight’s post might be a little less spectacular but it’s still pretty Iconic :)

item.title: Day 16 - SMASH!
item.description: Disaster strikes on the 16th of #Drinktober, as Gamma Ray exposure unleashes my infinite rage and I’m transformed into the Incredible Drunk Hulk, rampaging across the city in search of more beer!

item.title: Day 15 - No clever name tonight
item.description: Crystal wheat beer for the 15th of #Drinktober, with Hop Foundry’s Kristallweizen

item.title: Day 14 - Never a frown
item.description: 14th of #Drinktober and I’m just having a normal Monday, sitting around in my Golden Crown as you do.

item.title: Day 13 - We'll get there fast and then we'll take it slow
item.description: After I made it back from the depths of space, I needed a nice holiday. Here I am, relaxing in a tropical paradise with a can of Kokomo passion fruit and grapefruit pale ale :)

item.title: J2hooooooooe
item.description: Had a few days off posting due to work and personal life drama so Iâ€™m back! Enjoying the J20 life and my new favourite indulgence…. Black Forest milkshakes. Chocolate milkshake, black cherries, blend it up…. no wonder Iâ€™m not skinny despite the lack of meat!

item.title: Day 12 - Park in it, Viking!
item.description: Blasting across time and space for the 12th of #Drinktober, we find the mightiest warrior in the galaxy - the fearsome Space Viking!

item.title: Day 11 - So not the little guys from Fraggle Rock then?
item.description: I’ve had some very nice beers so far in #Drinktober, but tonight’s was a Doozie. From the excellently named By The Horns brewery \m/

item.title: Absolute vegan bullshit
item.description: Have you ever eaten a vegan sausage? I have now. It was awful. Had to spit it out, think it ruined my life. Three more weeks of this. Vegan sausage bullshit. Itâ€™s making me sad.

item.title: Day 10 - Is this about fancying the Scarlet Witch?
item.description: 10 days into #Drinktober and I’ve been overcome with Wanderlust

item.title: Beef dripping
item.description: I donâ€™t have anything exciting to say. Iâ€™ve just accepted drinking water is my life now…. made a vegan sausage casserole for tomorrow nights dinner and made very nice dumplings to chuck in. Of course housemate then reminds me that they have beef dripping in, so I canâ€™t have them. Chuffing excellent. Fml. Over and out ğŸ™„

item.title: Sharks!
item.description: 9th of #Drinktober. I heard it would be a Perfect Storm - I wasn’t expecting a Sharknado!

item.title: Day 8 - Curious
item.description: Getting a little fruity for the 8th of #Drinktober with this orange infused IPA

item.title: Foam shrimp and tramps shoes.
item.description: Today I had a late meeting again, so popped to the pub for the ultimate test. I was gaggingggggg for a drink. Any drink. Wine. Gin. Terps. I fancied one. The batman (I meant barman but autocorrect knows best) recommended an Alcohol Free Kopperberg. â€œItâ€™s just like the real thing! You canâ€™t even tell the difference!â€ I was assured. Not a cider drinker but I thought give it a bash.

item.title: Day 7 - Hat
item.description: Going cowboy style for the 7th of #Drinktober with this Wild Bill’s IPA.

item.title: Day 6 - HONK!
item.description: For the 6th of #Drinktober, I thought I’d have a nice quite drink in the village. Unluckily for me, my plans were disrupted by the arrival of this Mad Goose!

item.title: Vegetarianism is just a big Miss-Steak
item.description: Iâ€™ve realised that this site has become more my rambling blog than anything so Iâ€™ll keep it brief today! 90â€™s Carrie Bradshaw narration isnâ€™t a good look for me. Still alcohol free and Iâ€™ve developed a new love for good old water. Managed to stay off the quorn today and had a nice Sunday dinner feat. nut roast. I have however replaced my wine habit with a spending habit: Iâ€™ve bought a painting, another lamp, a hat, a magnetic eyelash set, a kaftan, a pigeon pin badge and a gift for the missus already this weekend (the last ones a secret.

item.title: Day 5 - Du Hast Bier
item.description: You’ve got a pussy! I have a dick-ah! So what’s the problem? Let’s do it quiiiiick Pulling out all the stops for the 5th of #Drinktober, for this Rammsteiner Pilsner I actually went on tour with Rammstein and they let me ride their giant cock cannon, as you can see in the totally real and definitely not at all photoshopped picture below.

item.title: Habit is a funny thing
item.description: Habits are funny arenâ€™t they! 5 days in and Iâ€™ve lost count of the number of times Iâ€™ve thought â€œoh Iâ€™ll just grab a cokeâ€ or wandered aimlessly to the wine aisle and spent Â£15 before Iâ€™ve even thought about if I actually want it! Today was chilled with the wife and Iâ€™ve smashed in a decent homemade Quorn Lasagne. I now own 48% shares in Quorn FYI. My skin is also looking much brighter, although I do smash a load of acid on my face every night because 30â€™s, so it could also be that.

item.title: Day 4 - Friday Night Fever
item.description: #Drinktober the 4th and I hit the dance floor to show off my moves with this Disco Forklift Truck. (The forklift’s parked outside, obviously)

item.title: Get your Friday Heidi on
item.description: Today is slightly better! Purchased some iron tablets: turned out thatâ€™s what fucked me up yesterday. An iron tablet and a multivit and Iâ€™m off. I went out for work drinks this evening and had (drum roll please!) a J20 and a virgin cocktail…. Which was nice but called â€˜the love islandâ€™ so minus 3 points. I also spent a hideous amount on experimental quorn and nutroasts in Lidl. Iâ€™m currently sipping cranberry juice out of a wine glass so I can express my inner Friday Heidi.

item.title: Day 3 - Twisted
item.description: For the 3rd of #Drinktober, a poorly executed tribute to the late Keith Flint as I become the twisted FireCatcher!

item.title: FML give me a kebab
item.description: Well today has kicked my arse. Iâ€™ve felt absolutely crap all day: not sure if itâ€™s lack of meat or caffeine. Shit day, sat in a meeting until 10.30 surrounded by wine and burgers…. kill me now. I also had my first Ribena. What a load of shit.

item.title: Day 2 - 5 miles off the ground
item.description: When we shoot to kill And you know we always will It’s a bomber! It’s a bomber! A Lancaster bomber - for the 2nd of #Drinktober I’ve got this rather tasty amber ale, even if it is named for the dark lands on the Wrong side of the Pennines…

item.title: Day 1.5 - Meanwhile on Planet Heidi
item.description: kill me now

item.title: Day 1 - Dirt Cheap
item.description: Contracts… Neckties! HIGH VOLTAGE!!! #Drinktober 2019 kicks into action with some Dirty Deeds

item.title: Day 31 - Drinkoween!
item.description: It’s the 31st of #Drinktober - #Drinkoween! So there was really no other option than to assemble a bunch of my spookiest stuff and finish off the month with the “Unofficial Beer Of Halloween” - Hobgoblin!

item.title: Day 30 - Blue moon
item.description: It’s the 30th of #Drinktober After escaping the Medusa’s petrifying gaze I thought I was safe, until the rising of the Blue Moon unleashed the beast within - transforming me into the dreaded Blue Wolfman!

item.title: Day 29 - Turned to stone
item.description: Disaster strikes for the 29th of #Drinktober - I’ve been turned into stone by the fearsome Medusa! Can I break the spell before the next exciting installment? Tune in tomorrow to find out…

item.title: Day 27 - Pumpking
item.description: A horrifying presence arises for the 27th of #Drinktober - Beware the evil of the Pumpking!

item.title: Day 28 - Ghost Ship
item.description: Shiver me timbers! Legends tell of a lost pirate vessel, cursed to wander the high seas eternally with her terrifying skeleton crew, only appearing on the 28th of #Drinktober to plunder the booty of the living. Beware the Ghost Ship, me hearties, lest she take ye to Davy Jones' locker!

item.title: Day 26 - Season of the Witch
item.description: Getting close to Halloween now, so for the rest of #Drinktober I’ll be drinking the spookiest beers I can find, starting with this Blonde Witch :)

item.title: Day 25 - SkÃ¥l!
item.description: A Viking theme for the 25th of #Drinktober with a mighty horn of Jorvik ale. SkÃ¥l!

item.title: Day 24 - Up the Irons
item.description: For the 24th of #Drinktober it’s on with the Maiden shirt and up with the horns for a lovely bottle of Trooper \m/

item.title: Day 23 - Urban Fox
item.description: Slept like crap yesterday and I’m absolutely shattered tonight, so no chance of any comical costume shenanigans:( But it’ll take more than that to stop me celebrating the 23rd of #Drinktober with this Urban Fox red ale :)

item.title: Day 22 - Proper Job
item.description: 22nd of #Drinktober - tonight I’m having a Proper Job :)

item.title: Day 21 - Rheinbacher
item.description: Getting a bit more mileage out of my awesome new beer stein for the 21st of #Drinktober with a Rheinbacher Weissbier and a German shirt I borrowed from Vikki

item.title: Day 20 - Yarr!!
item.description: Yarr! Little bit of a nautical theme for the 20th of #Drinktober - Cap’n Jonny’s relaxing after a long day on the high seas with a Shipyard IPA

item.title: Day 19 - Kingfisher
item.description: 19th of #Drinktober and it’s curry night again. This week I’m having a Kingfisher with a lamb naga mirch from the local takeaway :)

item.title: Day 18 - Arise, my mighty pink army!
item.description: It’s the 18th of #Drinktober and I’m having a pint of Joe’s Draft ale before going to see the awesome Evil Scarecrow in York \m/ Crabulon! Crabulon! Crabulon!

item.title: Day 17 - Bees!
item.description: For #Drinktober the 17th I’m having a Queen Bee honey ale. I’d be some kind of body-snatched doppelganger if I didn’t say that it’s the bee’s knees and it’s given me a bit of a buzz :)

item.title: Day 16 - Treacle Treat
item.description: We’re past the halfway mark now on the 16th of #Drinktober, and I’m having a Treacle Treat. Really nice dark ale with a cool skull design, which is always good :) How’s your water/ Heidi? :p

item.title: Day 15 - Felinfoel ESB
item.description: For the 15th of #Drinktober I’m having a Felinfoel ESB, mainly because its got an awesome dragon on the label :)

item.title: Day 14 - Dunkel Fester
item.description: It’s the 14th of #Drinktober and I’ve got a nice bottle of the excellently named Dunkel Fester :D

item.title: Day 13 - Time for pudding
item.description: 13th of #Drinktober - tonight I’m having a Sticky Toffee Pudding Ale. It’s really nice :)

item.title: Day 12 - King Cobra
item.description: 12th of #Drinktober and it’s curry night so I’m having a King Cobra. Hail to the King, baby!

item.title: Day 11 - We are the Road Crew
item.description: 11th of #Drinktober and I’m busting out an old favourite - MotÃ¶rhead RÃ¶ad Crew \m/

item.title: Day 10 - Dark matters
item.description: 10th of #Drinktober, and tonight I’m having a Dark Matter coffee porter. Nice beer, kind of chocolatey ! :)

item.title: Day 9 - Oktoberfest
item.description: For the 9th of #Drinktober I’ve got a great big Stein of Oktoberfest Bier which Vikki brought me back from Germany last week. Prost!

item.title: Day 8 - Hot tub (but no time machine)
item.description: The 8th of #Drinktober finds me recovering from an awesome weekend of retro gaming by depeopling in the hot tub with this Beardo IPA and season 5 of Steven Universe :)

item.title: Day 7 - Guinness
item.description: Bit of a quiet one for the 7th of #Drinktober, just chilling out with a pint of Guinness after video gaming all weekend.

item.title: Day 6 - A Thirst for Justice
item.description: For the 6th of #Drinktober, Judge Beerman is quenching his thirst for justice with a pint of Wadworth IPA

item.title: Day 5 - Modelo (and a burrito)
item.description: I’m away for the weekend so starting early for the 5th of #Drinktober with a Modelo and a burrito :)

item.title: Day 4 - Hoptical Illusion
item.description: Strange and mysterious goings on for the 4th of #Drinktober. Am I really drinking this beer, or is it just a… Hoptical Illusion…

item.title: Ghost Dance
item.description: It’s the third of #Drinktober, following up last night’s cowboy beer with this Ghost Dance Chinook Pale Ale, which is rather nice and hoppy :)

item.title: Jesse James IPA
item.description: Howdy there, pardners! For the second of #Drinktober, a quick raid of Aldi’s craft beer section yielded up this cowboy-themed American Pale Ale - seemed only right to dress for the occasion

item.title: Drinktober 2018 Begins!
item.description: Right then, let’s get this show on the road shall we? #Drinktober 2018 starts off nice and easy with some Heineken that was still in the fridge from the weekend.

item.title: Day 31 - Drinkoween!
item.description: Bit of a spooky theme for the 31st of #Drinktober - it’s Drinkoween! Tonight I’m drinking Pumpking - evil pumpkin beer

item.title: Day 30 - Cuba libre
item.description: 30th of #Drinktober - only one more day to go! Cuba Libre tonight, another premixed canned job :)

item.title: Day 20 - Roadcrew
item.description: 20th of #Drinktober, tonight I’ve got a pint of Roadcrew \m/

item.title: Day 29 - Tastes like strawberries
item.description: Not long to go now! 29th of #Drinktober, tonight’s offering is a strawberry daiquiri. Learned my lesson from the Pina colada and beefed it up with a drop of Bacardi :)

item.title: Day 28 - A bit of DnB
item.description: 28th of #Drinktober, and tonight I’ve found this alcoholic dandelion & burdock. It’s not bad :)

item.title: Day 27 - Tell 'em about the honey, Mummy!
item.description: 27th of #Drinktober, tonight I had a honey Jack Daniel’s & lemonade while I was out being crafty in the garage __

item.title: Day 26 - Pimms
item.description: For the 26th of #Drinktober, I finally opened this can of Pimms with blackberry and elderflower that’s been lurking in the fridge for a couple of years now. I’m not entirely sure what Pimms is exactly, but this basically tastes like Ribena.

item.title: Day 25 - This wasn't my best idea
item.description: 25th of #Drinktober, and tonight’s theme is “wow, I’ve got a lot of tequila left. I wonder if it mixes well with this tropical fruit drink?” Narrator : It did not mix well

item.title: Day 24 - Getting caught in the rain
item.description: 24th of #Drinktober - tonight I’ve got some kind of ready-mixed pina colada I found at Sainsbury’s. Very tropical

item.title: Day 23 - Ouzo margarita
item.description: 23rd of #Drinktober - random concoction week continues with this Ouzo margarita. It kind of works :)

item.title: Day 22 - What even is this stuff?
item.description: 22nd of #Drinktober, and we’ve reached the “any old shite that’s in the house” stage ) This is from a box of pre-packaged “flavoured shots” - think this was the apple one. __

item.title: Day 21 - TVR
item.description: Back on a more normal schedule for the 21st of #Drinktober and tonight is a total student classic, the TVR.

item.title: Day 19 - Frankenstein creation
item.description: 19th of #Drinktober and I’m getting inventive tonight. I call this one the Mead-garita. Half margarita mix, half mead - it’s actually pretty good :)

item.title: Day 18 - No sleep...
item.description: 18th of #Drinktober - Brooklyn Lager tonight

item.title: Day 17 - Cactus Jack
item.description: 17th of #Drinktober, and tonight it’s Cactus Jack’s Blackjack flavour schnapps. You probably wouldn’t like this one either :)

item.title: Day 16 - Ouzo
item.description: Ouzo and lemonade tonight for the 16th of #Drinktober - we’re past the halfway mark now, how’s your resolve holding up? :)

item.title: Day 15 - Random
item.description: 15th of #Drinktober and today I’m drinking some random stuff I found at Aldi. “AlizÃ©”, apparently - mix of cognac, vodka and passion fruit. I didn’t even know French vodka was a thing…

item.title: Day 14 - Scuttle left!
item.description: Alcoholic ginger beer for the 14th of #Drinktober.

item.title: Day 13 - Heineken
item.description: Out of town and such with the shockingly expensive and limited hotel bar selection for the 13th of #Drinktober, so it’s just a boring old pint of Heineken this evening. Might have to go find a proper pub…

item.title: Day 12 - More gin!
item.description: #Drinktober the 12th. Gin and pink grapefruit tonight - it’s really rather nice

item.title: Day 11 - Onwards to Valhalla!
item.description: 11th of #Drinktober and I’ve gone all Viking with a horn of mead \m/

item.title: Day 10 - Tequila time!
item.description: It’s the 10th of #Drinktober and tonight I’m having a margarita

item.title: Day 9 - bubbles!
item.description: Drop of cava for the 9th of #Drinktober - bubbleicious!

item.title: Day 8 - Sunshine!
item.description: 8th of #Drinktober and just for a change the daystar showed its face. Seemed like a good opportunity to take this Malibu & pineapple out in the garden and catch a bit of sun

item.title: Day 7 - This one's for Lemmy
item.description: Jack and coke for the 7th of #Drinktober. This one’s dedicated to Lemmy \m/

item.title: Day 6 - Curry night!
item.description: 6th of #Drinktober, and it’s Curry night! So that means chicken vindaloo and frosty Indian lager :)

item.title: Day 5 - Vodka and coke
item.description: It’s the 5th of #Drinktober, and today I’m having vodka and coke.

item.title: Day 4 - Old Rosie
item.description: Drop of cider for the 4th of #Drinktober - cheers!

item.title: Day 3 - Scurvy
item.description: For the 3rd of #Drinktober, I’ve got a bit of a pirate theme going, with Captain Morgan and coke. Yarr!

item.title: Day 2 - Gin o'Clock
item.description: 2nd of #Drinktober. Gin o’Clock :)

item.title: Day 1 - It begins!
item.description: #Drinktober begins with a nice pint of fine Ruby ale. Mmm, lovely…
